Package bec

package bec

The S-Port Back-end-Compiler (BEC).

A new Back-end-Compiler (BEC) is written which compiles to a Simula Virtual Machin (SVM).

That SVM is also implemented and incorporated in the new S-Port Simula System.

More Info: Portable Simula Revisited.
